title: Teams crash on phone call
body:
Hi, when i try to call a number, the app close

If I launch the app from terminal with "teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'", when it crash it say : 

`09:59:12.288 › render-process-gone
09:59:12.288 › before-quit
09:59:12.289 › window close
09:59:12.297 › window closed
09:59:12.297 › will-quit
09:59:12.297 › quit
`

Some specs of my machine : 

OS: Arch Linux x86_64
Kernel: Linux 6.10.6-arch1-1
DE: GNOME 46.4
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U (8) @ 3.90 GHz
GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 620 @ 1.10 GHz [Integrated]

Regards
